alert.note: Alert for Eaton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:26AM EDT until April 05 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EDT FOR EATON COUNTY... At 1025 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Capital Region International Airport to near Bellevue, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Charlotte... Eaton Rapids... Grand Ledge... Potterville... Bellevue... Kalamo... Olivet... Brookfield... Dimondale... Vermontville... Sunfield... Mulliken... Waverly... Gresham... Fitch H Beach Airpor... Skyview Estates Airp... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
